page.title: 08SHOPS AND SERVICES 2
page.content: There are 466 premises on the postal round and 7 collection boxes. Because of the main roads there are two{petrol service stations,}one of which also carries out M.O.T.'s and sells vehicles. There is a {coal merchant}in the village who delivers within a 12 mile radius of Puddletown.In winter they deliver up to 100 tonnes per week.A mobile{fishmonger}delivers seafoods caught at{Poole}to local homes.The {forge}produces metalwork and carries out metal repairs and a{building firm} operates in the Dorchester and local areas. Regular bus services operate along the main roads between{Blandford, {Weymouth,Dorchester and Poole.}A local coach company run services from{ {Dorchester}and the local villages.
